attributes.action: Adopt a German Pfand scheme to help recycle/reuse glass bottles
attributes.background: Since visiting Berlin a number of times I have noticed that they have a great and easy to follow system, whereby people that buy any bottles of alcohol (Beer/Wine/Etc) can return to a supermarket and deposit these to be recycled and in turn receive store credit which they can then use in store.

rejection.details:
The Government has announced plans for a deposit return scheme, so we're not sure what further action you'd like to see. 

You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/deposit-return-scheme-in-fight-against-plastic
